summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CRM user management and profile features. Backend APIs working well (95.2% success rate), admin interface fully functional, minor frontend routing issue with member profile access.

minor_issues.issue: Role promotion returns 404 when user is already admin
minor_issues.impact: Minor - expected behavior when trying to promote already-admin user

ui_bugs.issue: Member login successful but not redirecting to member dashboard
ui_bugs.selector: Login stays on /login page after successful member authentication

integration_issues.issue: Direct navigation to /member/profile redirects back to login

working_features.status: Fully functional - user list, filters, create user modal all working
Create, promote/demote, delete operations working correctly
Tous, Admins, Membres filters working properly

passed_tests: Admin users page navigation and display
Admin user creation (both admin and member roles)
Member profile API access and updates

priority_fixes.description: Member login is successful but not redirecting to /member/dashboard. Check AuthContext and LoginPage routing logic.
Direct navigation to /member/profile redirects to login even with valid member token. Check ProtectedRoute component and member routing.

verification_needed: Test member login flow after routing fixes
Verify member profile page accessibility and edit functionality
